DOC.brief_summary: GnRH administration during the luteal phase was found to significantly increase pregnancy rates in women undergoing fresh-cycle IVF cycles. We aim to investigate the effect of GnRH administration during the luteal phase in women undergoing frozen-thawed IVF cycles.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of GnRH Administration During Luteal Support in Frozen-thawed Transfer Cycles
DOC.criteria: Frozenthawed IVF cycles Hydrosalpings Uterine myomas
